summary: This document appears to be a certificate of LLC resolutions involving Jeffrey Epstein and other authorized signers. It outlines the powers granted to the authorized signers and confirms the validity of their signatures. The document emphasizes that the bank may rely on the instructions of the authorized signers unless notified otherwise.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is listed as an authorized signer for the LLC resolutions, indicating his role in the management of the company.

persons.name: Darren Indyke
persons.context: Darren Indyke is mentioned as another authorized signer for the LLC resolutions, indicating his involvement in the company's operations.

connections.description: Both individuals are authorized signers for the LLC, suggesting a professional relationship in managing the company's affairs.

keyFacts: The document outlines the powers granted to authorized signers for LLC resolutions.
Jeffrey Epstein and Darren Indyke are named as authorized signers.
The bank may rely on the instructions of the authorized signers unless notified otherwise.
